description: Use this operation to define the identity provider (IdP) that this workspace authenticates users from, using SAML. You can also map SAML assertion attributes to workspace user information and define which groups in the assertion attribute are to have the Admin and Editor roles in the workspace.

parameters.name: authenticationProviders
parameters.description: Specifies whether this workspace uses SAML 2.0, IAM Identity Center, or both to authenticate users for using the Grafana console within a workspace. For more information, see User authentication in Amazon Managed Grafana. (string) ---

parameters.name: samlConfiguration
parameters.description: If the workspace uses SAML, use this structure to map SAML assertion attributes to workspace user information and define which groups in the assertion attribute are to have the Admin and Editor roles in the workspace. allowedOrganizations (list) --- Lists which organizations defined in the SAML assertion are allowed to use the Amazon Managed Grafana workspace. If this is empty, all organizations in the assertion attribute have access. (string) --- assertionAttributes (dict) --- A structure that defines which attributes in the SAML assertion are to be used to define information about the users authenticated by that IdP to use the workspace. email (string) --- The name of the attribute within the SAML assertion to use as the email names for SAML users. groups (string) --- The name of the attribute within the SAML assertion to use as the user full 'friendly' names for user groups. login (string) --- The name of the attribute within the SAML assertion to use as the login names for SAML users. name (string) --- The name of the attribute within the SAML assertion to use as the user full 'friendly' names for SAML users. org (string) --- The name of the attribute within the SAML assertion to use as the user full 'friendly' names for the users' organizations. role (string) --- The name of the attribute within the SAML assertion to use as the user roles. A structure containing the identity provider (IdP) metadata used to integrate the identity provider with this workspace. url (string) --- The URL of the location containing the IdP metadata. xml (string) --- The full IdP metadata, in XML format. loginValidityDuration (integer) --- How long a sign-on session by a SAML user is valid, before the user has to sign on again. roleValues (dict) --- A structure containing arrays that map group names in the SAML assertion to the Grafana Admin and Editor roles in the workspace. admin (list) --- A list of groups from the SAML assertion attribute to grant the Grafana Admin role to. (string) --- editor (list) --- A list of groups from the SAML assertion attribute to grant the Grafana Editor role to. (string) ---

nested_params.name: allowedOrganizations
nested_params.description: Lists which organizations defined in the SAML assertion are allowed to use the Amazon Managed Grafana workspace. If this is empty, all organizations in the assertion attribute have access.

nested_params.name: assertionAttributes
nested_params.description: A structure that defines which attributes in the SAML assertion are to be used to define information about the users authenticated by that IdP to use the workspace.

nested_params.name: email
nested_params.description: The name of the attribute within the SAML assertion to use as the email names for SAML users.

nested_params.name: groups
nested_params.description: The name of the attribute within the SAML assertion to use as the user full 'friendly' names for user groups.

nested_params.name: login
nested_params.description: The name of the attribute within the SAML assertion to use as the login names for SAML users.

nested_params.name: name
nested_params.description: The name of the attribute within the SAML assertion to use as the user full 'friendly' names for SAML users.

nested_params.name: org
nested_params.description: The name of the attribute within the SAML assertion to use as the user full 'friendly' names for the users' organizations.

nested_params.name: role
nested_params.description: The name of the attribute within the SAML assertion to use as the user roles.

nested_params.name: idpMetadata
nested_params.description: A structure containing the identity provider (IdP) metadata used to integrate the identity provider with this workspace.

nested_params.name: url
nested_params.description: The URL of the location containing the IdP metadata.

nested_params.name: xml
nested_params.description: The full IdP metadata, in XML format.

nested_params.name: loginValidityDuration
nested_params.description: How long a sign-on session by a SAML user is valid, before the user has to sign on again.

nested_params.name: roleValues
nested_params.description: A structure containing arrays that map group names in the SAML assertion to the Grafana Admin and Editor roles in the workspace.

nested_params.name: admin
nested_params.description: A list of groups from the SAML assertion attribute to grant the Grafana Admin role to.

nested_params.name: editor
nested_params.description: A list of groups from the SAML assertion attribute to grant the Grafana Editor role to.

parameters.name: workspaceId
parameters.description: The ID of the workspace to update the authentication for.

nested_items.name: authentication
nested_items.description: A structure that describes the user authentication for this workspace after the update is made.

nested_items.name: ssoClientId
nested_items.description: The ID of the IAM Identity Center-managed application that is created by Amazon Managed Grafana.

nested_items.name: providers
nested_items.description: Specifies whether this workspace uses IAM Identity Center, SAML, or both methods to authenticate users to use the Grafana console in the Amazon Managed Grafana workspace.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: configuration
nested_items.description: A structure containing details about how this workspace works with SAML.

nested_items.name: allowedOrganizations
nested_items.description: Lists which organizations defined in the SAML assertion are allowed to use the Amazon Managed Grafana workspace. If this is empty, all organizations in the assertion attribute have access.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: assertionAttributes
nested_items.description: A structure that defines which attributes in the SAML assertion are to be used to define information about the users authenticated by that IdP to use the workspace.

nested_items.name: email
nested_items.description: The name of the attribute within the SAML assertion to use as the email names for SAML users.

nested_items.name: groups
nested_items.description: The name of the attribute within the SAML assertion to use as the user full 'friendly' names for user groups.

nested_items.name: login
nested_items.description: The name of the attribute within the SAML assertion to use as the login names for SAML users.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the attribute within the SAML assertion to use as the user full 'friendly' names for SAML users.

nested_items.name: org
nested_items.description: The name of the attribute within the SAML assertion to use as the user full 'friendly' names for the users' organizations.

nested_items.name: role
nested_items.description: The name of the attribute within the SAML assertion to use as the user roles.

nested_items.name: idpMetadata
nested_items.description: A structure containing the identity provider (IdP) metadata used to integrate the identity provider with this workspace.

nested_items.name: url
nested_items.description: The URL of the location containing the IdP metadata.

nested_items.name: xml
nested_items.description: The full IdP metadata, in XML format.

nested_items.name: loginValidityDuration
nested_items.description: How long a sign-on session by a SAML user is valid, before the user has to sign on again.

nested_items.name: roleValues
nested_items.description: A structure containing arrays that map group names in the SAML assertion to the Grafana Admin and Editor roles in the workspace.

nested_items.name: admin
nested_items.description: A list of groups from the SAML assertion attribute to grant the Grafana Admin role to.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: editor
nested_items.description: A list of groups from the SAML assertion attribute to grant the Grafana Editor role to.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: Specifies whether the workspace's SAML configuration is complete.
